lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - A Guy's Advice on Women

sentence.idiomatic: It is very rare to find a person in the world who is not vain.
He paid a high price for his vanity.
You can't tell that she is a vain person.
He always feels that his girlfriend isn't dedicated to their relationship.
His heart is not as devoted as I had imagined.
Everyone wishes for a devoted love.
Facing everyone's sarcasm she felt extremely sad.
Don't be sarcastic with him, he is already unhappy enough.
He likes to be sarcastic to people, so no one likes him.
He believes that a person's quality of character is more important than ability.
He is a person of poor character. Don't date him anymore.
Your girlfriend is a really good person.
They are a group of promising young stars in the IT field.
We are recruiting promising young researchers right now.
He became a mayor when he was only 30. He is truly a promising young man.
You're such a great catch. When do you plan to get married?
Everyone says that he is the great catch in our company.
He is a great catch in everybody's eyes.
We all knew about this matter. Only he was kept in the dark.
Until the day before his death no one know the truth of his illness. It was because he was afraid everyone would be sad, so he kept them all in the dark.
Tell me what happened. Don't keep me in the dark.
Our company is preparing to go public.
This company went public two months ago already.
This company will be listed on the American stock market this year.
Everyone wants to become a millionaire.
I never imagined the young millionaire they were talking about was you.
Many people are curious about the lives of the rich.
Her boyfriend really plays around.
All her friends say that her boyfriend is a player, but she doesn't believe it at all.
When you get a boyfriend, don't go for the flirtatious kind.
Zhang Liang, you’re not a true friend. You haven’t contacted me in such a long time! Now that you have a girlfriend, you’ve forgotten all about your bro, huh?
Hey, Zhen Hua, don’t get sarcastic with me. Lately there’s been a little problem between Lili and me.
Oh? What is it? You must be messing around, and she found you out.

Don’t talk nonsense. A few days ago Lili ran into her ex-boyfriend. Can you guess who he is? Unbelievably, he’s that internet millionaire, Liu Xiang! The guy is only 30 years old, and his company is already listed on the stock market in the U.S.
Huh? Lili and he were… You had better look out! Don’t follow in my footsteps. My girlfriend was cheating on me, and I was totally in the dark.
You’re talking nonsense again! Lili isn’t that kind of person. She and Liu Xiang are only friends now.
How do you know? Liu Xiang is now a great catch! What girl wouldn’t like this kind of promising young man? He drives a sports car, drinks red wine, gives her diamonds… How do we compare with that?
Lili is not the same as other girls. She is a good person. She is very dedicated, and isn’t vain, either. She would absolutely never cheat on me.
I know she’s nice. That’s why Liu Xiang likes her too. These kinds of wealthy people look for girls with a good character. His own ex-girlfriend would be best. They understand each other better!

word.literal: to not be good enough for

sentence.idiomatic: When you put it that way, it actually does make sense. Yeah, Lili is such a good girl, so she certainly has a lot of people that like her. I even sometimes feel that I’m not good enough for her. Liu Xiang is so successful, and is also her ex-boyfriend. Now that they’ve met again, there certainly must be feelings. No wonder lately Lili is always saying she is busy. Also, in the evenings she doesn’t chat with me online anymore.
Yeah. Now you’ve finally come around. Hey, bro, try and get over it.
